publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3177 Dr Richard Simpson: The Draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2002—That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*

S1M-3177 Dr Richard Simpson: The Draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2002—That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace
